item.title: Nintendo 64 – Nintendo Switch Online for Switch 2 adds rewind, CRT filter, and control mapping features
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/nintendo-64-nintendo-switch-online-for-switch-2-adds-rewind-crt-filter-and-control-mapping-features

  • Switch 2

A look at the new features in action.

Nintendo has released a new trailer for the Switch 2 version of the Nintendo 64 – Nintendo Switch Online application, highlighting new features exclusive to the Switch 2 version.

The new features include:

  • Rewind – If you make a mistake, easily rewind gameplay and try again.
  • CRT Screen Filter – Recreate the look of a CRT television.
  • View / Change Controls – Check what each button does in the game your playing, and reassign button mappings to suit your play style. (works on both Switch and Switch 2).

Watch the video below.

Nintendo 64 – Nintendo Switch Online – Switch 2 Features Update
